judgment_text:
MISC.19.92-TP.499.91(33).sxw
mnm
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
MISC. PETITION NO. 19 OF 1992
IN
TESTAMENTARY PETITION NO. 499 OF 1991
Kamruddin Ismail alias John While William 
Deceased 
Mrs. Hafiza Khatoon W/o. Kamruddin Ismail Shaikh ...Petitioner
alias John White William
Vs.
Iqbal Mohamed Abdul Rehman 
 ...Respondent
And
Mrs. Zeenat Iqbal Mohammed Abdul Rehman
 ...Opponent
Ms. Shaila R. Pandey for Petitioner 
Mr. Deepak Pandey i/b. C.N. Kumar for Petitioner 5(a) to 5(c)
Mr. R.D. Thorat for Respondent No.2
CORAM : MRS. ROSHAN DALVI, J.

 DATED : 7TH MAY, 2012
P.C. :
.  
The Petitioner in Petition No.15 of 1992 has tendered oral 
and documentary evidence. The admissibility of her documents 
is considered. 
.  
Affidavit of examination in chief of the Petitioner in this 
Petition is taken on record. The Petitioner does not rely upon any 
documents. 
.  
The Petitioner in this Petition also shall have to be cross 
examined   before   the   Court   Commissioner.  
  The   same 
MISC.19.92-TP.499.91(33).sxw
Commissioner appointed in Petition No.15 of 1992 shall be the 
Commissioner in this Petition. 
.  
Parties   shall   appear   before   the   Commissioner   for   cross 
examination of this Petitioner after the cross examination of the 
Petitioner in Petition No.15 of 1992 is complete. 
.  
Since the Petitioner in Petition No.15 of 1992 has sought to 
produce   evidence   of   three   other   witnesses   to   identify   the 
documents marked for identification that evidence shall proceed 
after the cross examination of the Petitioner in this Petition is 
complete. 
.  
Issue witness summons upon the Manager of Vijaya Bank 
Limited   at   the   date   time   and   place   to   be   specified   by   the 
Commissioner   who   would   record   evidence   in   this   Petition   to 
produce before the Commissioner the account opening form and 
the   specimen   signature   card   of   opening   of   Savings   Account 
standing   in   the   name   of   the   Petitioner   and   to   identify   the 
passbook issued to the Petitioner. 
.  
Issue   witness   summons   upon   the   Manager   of  Haj 
Committee and the Manager of the Cemetery where the deceased 
has been buried to appear on the date, time and place mentioned 
by the Commissioner for recording evidence in the above petition 
to identify the documents marked for identification and to give 
related evidence. 
MISC.19.92-TP.499.91(33).sxw
.  
This   Petition   also   shall   be   placed   on   board   along   with 
Petition No.15 of 1992 after the entire evidence in Petition No.15 
of 1992 is completed as directed today. 
 (ROSHAN DALVI, J.)
